items.sentence: Tom could\'ve done that by himself, I think.

This is a song I learned when I was a child.
This is one of the oldest schools in Boston.
I never wash the dishes unless I\'m told to.
I never would\'ve guessed Tom could do that.
I thought you were supposed to be in Boston.
I told Tom that he should apologize to Mary.
The game was called off because of the rain.
Tom doesn\'t feel we\'re helping him enough.
I never spend a day without thinking of you.
I plan to go to Boston, but not this summer.
This is a list of what I want for Christmas.
Those children are waiting for their mother.

What\'s the best way to get over a hangover?
What\'s your favorite topic of conversation?

What makes you think you\'re better than me?
